mapper.update: update pltf_citem set p_seq=#{pseq}, type=#{type}, name=#{name}, description=#{description}, component=#{component}, entry_point=#{entryPoint}, parameter=#{parameter}, sort=#{sort}, fg_visible=#{fgVisible}, launch_type=#{launchType}, scr_width=#{scrWidth}, scr_height=#{scrHeight}, fg_delete=#{fgDelete}, from_valid=#{fromValid}, to_valid=#{toValid}, mod_username=#{modUsername}, mod_date=#{modDate} where c_seq=#{cseq}
mapper.select: select count(x.c_seq) from pltf_citem x, pltf_citem_user_rl y, vw_pltf_user z where x.c_seq=#{cseq} and x.fg_delete='N' and x.c_seq=y.c_seq and y.u_seq=z.u_seq and y.fg_delete='N'
select * from pltf_citem_lang_rl where c_seq=#{cseq} and l_seq=#{lseq}

select x.*, ( select d.text from pltf_citem_lang_rl a, pltf_lang b, pltf_lang_kind c, pltf_lang_detail d where a.c_seq=x.c_seq and a.l_seq=b.l_seq and b.basename=#{basename} and b.fg_delete='N' and b.basename=c.basename and c.code=#{lang} and c.fg_delete='N' and b.l_seq=d.l_seq and c.lk_seq=d.lk_seq and d.fg_delete='N' ) name2 from pltf_citem x where x.fg_delete='N'
and x.fg_visible='Y' and x.from_valid < sysdate and x.to_valid >= sysdate
start with x.c_seq=#{cseq}
start with x.name='ROOT'
connect by prior x.c_seq=x.p_seq order siblings by x.sort, x.reg_date
